titles.title: O The Blood Of Jesus Washes

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O the blood of Jesus washes
White as snow. (3x)
O, the blood of Jesus washes white as snow,
I know that this is true.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
O, the blood of Jesus washes
Sin all away, (3x)
O, the blood of Jesus washes sin all away,
I know that this is true.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O, the blood of Jesus makes
Those demons flee. (3x)
O, the blood of Jesus makes Those demons flee,
I know that this is true.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
O, the blood of Jesus sets the
Captives free. (3x)
O, the blood of Jesus sets the captives free.
I know that this is true.
